class_notes:
499R is intended for students who have past research experience either in 399R, through a research program, or through ample volunteer experience.  Students in 499R will present a poster of their research in the spring poster session.  
After lining up a faculty research advisor, students should submit a permission number request form. The link to the form and helpful information are available on the department's "Get Involved in Research" website (http://chemistry.emory.edu/home/undergraduate/research.html).
course_description:
Students do original research in accordance
with ability and background and present their findings in an oral or poster
session. May be repeated. Total research credit to be used toward an
undergraduate degree not to exceed twelve hours. 3 or more credits can count
to BS elective.
